replaceDefaultAssociation.description: Whether this association should replace the association with the VPC's default security group that is created when no security groups are specified during VPC endpoint creation. At most 1 association per-VPC endpoint should be configured with `replace_default_association = true`.

securityGroupId.description: The ID of the security group to be associated with the VPC endpoint.

vpcEndpointId.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint with which the security group will be associated.
